OmniTrackingComponentDef.name: OmniTrackingComponentDef
OmniTrackingComponentDef.description: Represents a FlexCard or OmniScript that is a member of an OmniTrackingGroup, which tracks user interactions in OmniAnalytics.

ComponentType.description: The type of component for which user interactions are tracked.

ComponentVersion.description: The version of the FlexCard or OmniScript.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the OmniTrackingComponentDef in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters and must be unique in your organization. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. Limit: 80 characters. Note When creating large sets of data, always specify a unique DeveloperName for each record. If no DeveloperName is specified, performance may slow while Salesforce generates one for each record. Note Only users with View DeveloperName OR View Setup and Configuration permission can view, group, sort, and filter this field.

MasterLabel.description: The unique master label of the OmniTrackingComponentDef. This internal label doesnâ€™t get translated.

OmniTrackingComponentDefKey.description: A UUID generated internally by Salesforce to uniquely identify an OmniTrackingComponentDef record across all orgs.

OmniTrackingGroup.description: The ID of the related OmniTrackingGroup object.

OmniTrackingComponentDef.accessRules: having an OmniStudio license and enabling OmniAnalytics in Setup
